# NSRegularExpression.MatchingFlags

**Structure**

Set by the Block as the matching progresses, completes, or fails. Used by the method [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSRegularExpression/enumerateMatches(in:options:range:using:)].

## Declaration

```swift
struct MatchingFlags
```

## Constants

- **progress**: Set when the Block is called to report progress during a long-running match operation.
- **completed**: Set when the Block is called after matching has completed.
- **hitEnd**: Set when the current match operation reached the end of the search range.
- **requiredEnd**: Set when the current match depended on the location of the end of the search range.
- **internalError**: Set when matching failed due to an internal error.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Constants

- **NSRegularExpression.Options**: These constants define the regular expression options. These constants are used by the property [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSRegularExpression/options-swift.property], [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSRegularExpression/regularExpressionWithPattern:options:error:], and [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSRegularExpression/init(pattern:options:)].
- **NSRegularExpression.MatchingOptions**: The matching options constants specify the reporting, completion and matching rules to the expression matching methods. These constants are used by all methods that search for, or replace values, using a regular expression.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- ExpressibleByArrayLiteral
- OptionSet
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
- SetAlgebra
